reviews.review_msg: Shane is well prepared, enthusiastic, informed, and kind. The course (on climate change and media) was well paced and very timely. He required genuine participation and preparation from students.
My favourite prof ever. She's brilliant. Only A+ I got during my undergrad. Her lectures are dense, but if you're interested in the subject matter, that's a good thing. And she's super cute too!
It's a great theory class where undergraduate and graduate students are learning together.
